data.md:MetaData: Meteorological observations during BADGER cruise from River Gambia to River Serralione started at 1752-08-26

Ship: Badger (Snow), Start of voyage: 1752-08-26, End of voyage: 1752-09-17, Voyage: River Gambia - River Serralione, 1st Observer: Thomas Hankenson (Captain), 2nd Observer: Francis Swanston (1st Officer/Master), Company: Royal Navy, Other ship information: 10G 268BM SWALLOW CLASS
CLIWOC: A Climatological Database for the World's Oceans 1750–1854 (and 10 more publications about CLIWOC results in the same volume)
